pages.text: With your charcoal, you can now create things like torches and campfires. But there is a catch! Both of these blocks are unlit by default and need to be lit. Campfires are renewable while torches burn out and need to be recrafted with brand new charcoal to be useable again (see EMI).

If by this time you are still using a one time fire starter, you should upgrade to a fire bow now. You can also sneak and right click on lit torches with unlit torches to light them up (or craft them together) so that you don't have to keep making firebows. You can use your campfire to cook your meat.

To quench your thrist, you will need a water purifier. In order to get the glass which is needed to create it and the bottles, just put your sand in the campfire. Keep in mind that it is far less efficient as you will get a shard instead of a full block. Temperature mangement is something you'll also have to consider, so don't stay near the campfires for too long!
